reviewText: I was very pleased with Dhoom 2 and the whole set was very entertaining.  The wildly entertaining dialogue, and over-the-top stunts were exceptional.

So, nowhere does it state that this is a Blu-ray edition. I got it based off of the description that it's a regular DVD format. Very disappointed we can't watch the movies because we'd first have to purchase a Blu-ray player! Can't rate the films themselves because we haven't watched them. Disappointing.
